metadata.name: Sweet pop music
metadata.description:
This animation work is the memorable first in the Grid Layout series.
We plan to exhibit them little by little as a series in the future, so please keep checking back!

She loves to go outside on sunny days.
Pop music and sweet candies cheer her up.
Everyone should try walking outside.
You will forget all the bad things and feel happy.
I hope that people who see this work will feel cheerful.
I wish you all happy days.
